original: 琅邪臨沂人，乃《二十四孝》中著名的王祥異母弟。與兄長情深篤厚，歷仕曹魏、西晉，以品德高尚聞名。後世孫王導和王敦乃東晉權傾朝野的重臣。
text: Langxie Linyi, is the famous half brother of Wang Xiang in 'Twenty-Four Filial Piety'. He has a deep love with his elder brother. He has served in Cao Wei and Western Jin Dynasty and is famous for his high moral character. Later generations Sun Wangdao and Wang Dun are the important ministers of the Eastern Jin Dynasty.
